name: cv-portfolio
description: Personal CV Portfolio Website with React and Node.js

scripts.dev: npm run setup:dev && concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client"
scripts.build: npm run setup:prod && cd frontend && npm run build
scripts.build:prod: npm run setup:prod && cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.lint: cd frontend && npm run lint && cd ../backend && npm run lint
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules backend/.env frontend/.env
scripts.fresh-install: npm run clean && npm run install-all

author: ndtp2003
